You are here: [Welcome Home] > [HtmlReference HTML Reference] > [CharacterEntities Character entities] > [CharacterEntitiesG G] > &gamma;

== Value ==

There are 2 variations of this entity:

  * `&Gamma;` maps to the Unicode character [http://www.fileformat.info/info/unicode/char/0393/index.htm U+00393].
  * `&gamma;` maps to the Unicode character [http://www.fileformat.info/info/unicode/char/03b3/index.htm U+003B3].
